title: Mad Evolution: Idle Merge
description: Mad Evolution: Idle Merge is a chaotic creature-combining simulator where you fuse bizarre monsters into even stranger hybrids. Gather coins nonstop, evolve your weirdest creations, and push the limits of logic as you unlock new, surreal worlds. Itâ€™s your job to unleash wild upgrades and build the ultimate monster empire in this endlessly quirky experiment.
